attributes.additional_details:
Sign to get all religious practices closed this is creating crime daily and why should it be a place for everyone to meet if you want to believe in god then do it in the comfort of your own home all religion is based on factual events and should not be given any rights to build more mosques or churches etc, if.you wish to believe then fine but do not involve the people who do not!

These religious activities are causing a war right now lets get them taken off our streets.
